tr3zcy34Y-Z0nepEM.name: Sharp Claws (antlers on arms)

tJtx22qIFRiMVac7O.name: Incurious
tJtx22qIFRiMVac7O.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

t1bCZOEqON_5bLtUM.name: Hidebound
t1bCZOEqON_5bLtUM.notes: -2 penalty on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage.
